page.title: 08A day in my life
page.content: My name is Debbie Drummond and I live with my foster mum and dad. At 7.35 auntie Sue wakes me up for a breakfast of bran flakes,orange,toast and tea. I get ready for school which starts at 9am.In the morning we do mathematics and written work. I like writing stories.I go home for dinner (but most of my friends stay dinner or packed lunch).I have a salad.After lunch we do activities like P.E.,games,craft, art,music and recorders. I like P.E. School breaks up at 3.30pm.At home I may read a book. My favourite author is C.S.Lewis.Or I may watch the T.V or play out until tea time.Some nights I go to judo or guides.At guides we do tracking,games and make things like cards and baskets.I get a wash then have supper I have a cup of tea and a biscuit and go to bed at about 9,o,clock.
